Text.val: -- Author: Bujakowski Grzegorz
This program is not working in a multy user environment on one PQS(Client+ date)
only one user can modyfy at the same time
07.03.2013 JH SCR17995 Replaced screen button load logic by GB901
07.11.2012 GB SCR17675 Set the PI.GROUP = blank if the GB900 is calls
09.10.2012 SH SCR17574 Changed Blob Ansi to Unicode blob (CPKC,CPKS)
29.02.2012 SH SCR17053 Change call of GM900 to GB900 (permission check)
11.08.2011 GB SCR16040 Remove any transaction / locking from online modules,
define virtuals for screen where modifications are allowed and stored changes
by using a separate batch task
03.05.2011 SH SCR16387 Changed Heller in Admin currency
29.03.2010 AK SCR15416 change the tarnsaction handling ofCPKC to ' no lock'
04.12.2009 AK SCR15066 added new column Financed balance
10.09.2009 AK SCR14890 change text in online screen
09.09.2009 GB SCR14883 Changed calculation for 5 % and
Percentage balance in rel. to cleared debtor balance
07.09.2009 AK SCR14819 use debtor heller to display and not DEBC_DEBC
18.08.2009 GB SCR14819 Changed selection for 'legal collection',
added Finance limit
06.07.2009 GB SCR14635 Changed mask of date in SQL command
-- Shortcut labels
-- Shortcut handling
call online task

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast (sum (CPKC_BALANCE) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/CPKC where CPKC_ADMNO = :2 and CPKC_CLNTNO = :3 and CPKC_INDIVIDUAL = ':4' and CPKC_DATE = ':5' for fetch only
select cast ((sum (CMCD_SPECIALACCOUNTH) + sum (CMCD_DISPUTESGROSSH)) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/CMCD where CMCD_ADMNO = :2 and CMCD_CLNTNO = :3 for fetch only

select cast ((sum (CMON_CURRBALFACTACC) + sum (CMON_CURRBALSPECIALACC)) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/CMON where CMON_ADMNO = :2 and CMON_CLNTNO = :3 and CMON_YEAR = :4 and CMON_MONTH = :5 and CMON_CURRENCY = 'EUR' for fetch only
select cast ((sum (ACCC_MUTAFACTORING) + sum (ACCC_MUTASPECIAL)) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/ACCC where ACCC_ACCT_ADMNO = :2 and ACCC_ACCT_CLNTNO = :3 for fetch only

select cast (sum (CMON_CURRBALFACTACC) as decimal (13,2)), cast (sum (CMON_CURRBALSPECIALACC) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/CMON where CMON_ADMNO = :2 and CMON_CLNTNO = :3 and CMON_YEAR = :4 and CMON_MONTH = :5 and CMON_CURRENCY = ':6' for fetch only

select cast (sum (CMCD_SPECIALACCOUNTH) as decimal (13,2)), cast (sum (CMCD_DISPUTESGROSSH) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/CMCD where CMCD_ADMNO = :2 and CMCD_CLNTNO = :3 and (CMCD_MARKCODE = :4 or CMCD_MARKCODE = :5) for fetch only

select cast (sum (ACCC_MUTAFACTORING) as decimal (13,2)), cast (sum (ACCC_MUTASPECIAL) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/ACCC where ACCC_ACCT_ADMNO = :2 and ACCC_ACCT_CLNTNO = :3 and ACCC_ACCT_DATE = ':4' and ACCC_MUTTYPE >= 95 for fetch only

Text.val: -- If CPKC_REMARKS (sub task) was modified
-- end CPKC_REMARKS (sub task) was modified
Users press key 'Esc'
Users changes something on screen, ask for confirmation

Text.valUnicode: Related to ‘To be evaluated debtors balance’
